titleStmt.title: The good and faithful servant set forth in a sermon preached at Hatfield Broad-Oake in Essex, August 2. the day before the funeral of Mr. John Warren, sometime minister of the gospel there. Now published with some small additions, and a brief account of his life and character. By Henry Lukin.
titleStmt.author: Lukin, H. (Henry), 1628-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns, the lower end of Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
